docs.text: Welcome to MkDocs For full documentation visit mkdocs.org . Commands mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project. mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server. mkdocs build - Build the documentation site. mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit. Project layout mkdocs.yml # The configuration file. docs/ index.md # The documentation homepage. ... # Other markdown pages, images and other files.
docs.title: Home

docs.text: For full documentation visit mkdocs.org .
docs.title: Welcome to MkDocs

docs.text: mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project. mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server. mkdocs build - Build the documentation site. mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit.
docs.title: Commands

docs.text: mkdocs.yml # The configuration file. docs/ index.md # The documentation homepage. ... # Other markdown pages, images and other files.
docs.title: Project layout

docs.text: Get CLIENTS Get clients by room number and reservation time URL : /api/1/?checkin=<date>&checkout=<date>&number=<room_number> Method : GET Auth required : YES Permissions required : None Data constraints : {} Success Responses Code : 200 OK Content : {[]} [ { "client": { "id": 1, "first_name": "Kitchen", "last_name": "Peach", "birthdate": "2000-12-02", "sex": "M", "tel": "89218376464", "city": "Dallas", "passport": "C4831676" } } ]
docs.title: Get clients by room number and reservation time

docs.text: Get clients by room number and reservation time URL : /api/1/?checkin=<date>&checkout=<date>&number=<room_number> Method : GET Auth required : YES Permissions required : None Data constraints : {}
docs.title: Get CLIENTS

docs.text: Code : 200 OK Content : {[]} [ { "client": { "id": 1, "first_name": "Kitchen", "last_name": "Peach", "birthdate": "2000-12-02", "sex": "M", "tel": "89218376464", "city": "Dallas", "passport": "C4831676" } } ]
docs.title: Success Responses

docs.text: Get NUMBER of CLIENTS Get number of clients that come from the same city URL : /api/2/?city=<city> Method : GET Auth required : YES Permissions required : None Data constraints : {} Success Responses Code : 200 OK Content : {[]} [ { "city": "Rockford", "count": 3 } ]
docs.title: Get number of clients come from the same city

docs.text: Get number of clients that come from the same city URL : /api/2/?city=<city> Method : GET Auth required : YES Permissions required : None Data constraints : {}
docs.title: Get NUMBER of CLIENTS

docs.text: Code : 200 OK Content : {[]} [ { "city": "Rockford", "count": 3 } ]
docs.title: Success Responses

docs.text: Get EMPLOYEE by CLIENT and DATE Get employee that worked in a room of a specific client in a specific time URL : /api/3/?client=<client>&date=<date> Method : GET Auth required : YES Permissions required : None Data constraints : {} Success Responses Code : 200 OK Content : {[]} [ { "date": "2021-11-05", "employee": { "id": 1, "first_name": "Jessie", "last_name": "Musashi", "salary": 30000, "passport": "U9344954" } } ]
docs.title: Get employee that worked in specific room in a specific time

docs.text: Get employee that worked in a room of a specific client in a specific time URL : /api/3/?client=<client>&date=<date> Method : GET Auth required : YES Permissions required : None Data constraints : {}
docs.title: Get EMPLOYEE by CLIENT and DATE

docs.text: Code : 200 OK Content : {[]} [ { "date": "2021-11-05", "employee": { "id": 1, "first_name": "Jessie", "last_name": "Musashi", "salary": 30000, "passport": "U9344954" } } ]
docs.title: Success Responses

docs.text: Get list of ROOM Get list of all available rooms URL : /api/4/ Method : GET Auth required : YES Permissions required : None Data constraints : {} Success Responses Code : 200 OK Content : {[]} [ { "id": 3, "type": "Triple", "number": 103, "price": 1500, "floor": 1 }, { "id": 5, "type": "Single", "number": 201, "price": 1000, "floor": 2 }, { "id": 6, "type": "Single", "number": 202, "price": 1000, "floor": 2 } ]

docs.text: Get ROOM in specific FLOOR Get number of rooms in specific floor URL : /api/5/?floor=<floor> Method : GET Auth required : YES Permissions required : None Data constraints : {} Success Responses Code : 200 OK Content : {[]} [ { "floor": 1, "count": 3 } ]
